name: ANTI-Simon
description:
Hi, my name is Simon.
No, my name is ANTI-Simon.
The challange is to do as I say.
NO, the challange is to AVOID doing as I say.
Anyway, use your mouse to click the lights.
But don't you dare to copy any move ANTI-SIMON makes.

This game has been created by @didicoronel for Pulmonear "Duplicar es morir" game jam.
